paper_abstract: We show the existence of weak epsilon-nets of size O(1/epsilon log log (1/epsilon)) for point sets and axis-parallel boxes in R(d) for d >= 4. Our analysis uses a non-trivial variant of the recent technique of Aronov et al. (2009) [3] that yields (strong) E-nets, whose size have the above asymptotic bound, for d = 2, 3. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A note about weak epsilon-nets for axis-parallel boxes in d-space
